body: `to` doesn't have a `requires_grad` parameter in PyTorch, and I don't think it should; it's not a tensor creation function any more than `add` is.  Why do we have inconsistency is this direction over say, none of the tensor creation functions take requires_grad, and you have to call `requires_grad_()` at the end of a call chain (why is the recommended way to do this in PyTorch now).
